trans-unit.source: Represents a single node in the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XML 文档中的单个节点。

trans-unit.source: This class implements the W3C Document Object Model (DOM) Level 1 Core and the Core DOM Level 2.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现 W3C 文档对象模型 (DOM) 级别 1 核心和核心 DOM 级别 2。

trans-unit.source: The DOM is an in-memory (cache) tree representation of an XML document.
trans-unit.target: DOM 是 XML 文档的内存中（缓存）树表示形式。

trans-unit.source: `XmlNode` is the base class in the .NET implementation of the DOM.
trans-unit.target: `XmlNode` 是 DOM 的.NET 实现中的基类

trans-unit.source: It supports XPath selections and provides editing capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 它支持 XPath 选择，并提供编辑功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> class extends `XmlNode` and represents an XML document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>类扩展`XmlNode`和表示 XML 文档。

trans-unit.source: You can use `XmlDocument` to load and save XML data.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`XmlDocument`用于加载和保存 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: It also includes methods for node creation.
trans-unit.target: 它还包括用于节点创建方法。

trans-unit.source: See [XML Document Object Model (DOM)](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xml-document-object-model-dom.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[XML 文档对象模型 (DOM)](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xml-document-object-model-dom.md)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions raised as a result of using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class, such as the <xref:System.Xml.XmlException> class may contain sensitive information that should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 由于使用而引发的异常<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>类，如<xref:System.Xml.XmlException>类可能包含不应在不受信任的方案中公开的敏感信息。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions should be properly handled so that this sensitive information is not exposed in untrusted scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 应正确处理异常，以便在不受信任的情况下不公开此敏感信息。

trans-unit.source: The node to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的节点。

trans-unit.source: All the contents of the node to be added are moved into the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的节点的全部内容会移动到指定位置。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified node to the end of the list of child nodes, of this node.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的节点添加到该节点的子节点列表的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The node added.
trans-unit.target: 添加的节点。

trans-unit.source: If the `newChild` is already in the tree, it is removed from its original position and added to its target position.
trans-unit.target: 如果`newChild`是已在树中，它是从其原始位置移除并添加到其目标位置。

trans-unit.source: For more information about inserting nodes, see [Inserting Nodes into an XML Document](~/docs/standard/data/xml/inserting-nodes-into-an-xml-document.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关插入节点的详细信息，请参阅[将节点插入 XML 文档](~/docs/standard/data/xml/inserting-nodes-into-an-xml-document.md)。

trans-unit.source: If the node being inserted was created from another document, you can use <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.ImportNode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to import the node to the current document.
trans-unit.target: 如果插入的节点已创建从另一个文档，则可以使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.ImportNode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>将节点导入到当前文档。

trans-unit.source: The imported node can then be inserted into the current document.
trans-unit.target: 然后，导入的节点可以插入到当前文档中。

trans-unit.source: The following example adds a new node to the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将新节点添加到 XML 文档。

trans-unit.source: **Output:**
This node is of a type that does not allow child nodes of the type of the <paramref name="newChild" /> node.
trans-unit.target: 此节点的类型不允许 <paramref name="newChild" /> 节点类型的子节点。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="newChild" /> is an ancestor of this node.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newChild" /> 是此节点的上级节点。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="newChild" /> was created from a different document than the one that created this node.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newChild" /> 是从不同于创建此节点的文档创建的。

trans-unit.source: This node is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 该节点是只读的。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="AppendChild" /> in a derived class, in order for events to be raised correctly, you must call the <see langword="AppendChild" /> method of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see langword="AppendChild" />在派生类中，按正确，会引发事件的顺序必须调用<see langword="AppendChild" />基本类的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttributeCollection" /> containing the attributes of this node.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttributeCollection" />，它包含该节点的特性。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="XmlAttributeCollection" /> containing the attributes of the node.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="XmlAttributeCollection" />，它包含该节点的特性。

trans-unit.source: If the node is of type XmlNodeType.Element, the attributes of the node are returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点为 XmlNodeType.Element 类型，则返回该节点的属性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this property returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 对于其他类型的单元格，此属性返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将新属性添加到 XML 文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets the base URI of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前节点的基 URI。

trans-unit.source: The location from which the node was loaded or String.Empty if the node has no base URI.
trans-unit.target: 从其加载节点的位置；如果节点没有基 URI，则为 String.Empty。

trans-unit.source: A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data aggregated using various W3C standard inclusion mechanisms and therefore contains nodes that come from different places.
trans-unit.target: 联网的 XML 文档的聚合使用各种 W3C 标准包含机制的数据块组成，因此包含来自不同位置的节点。

trans-unit.source: The `BaseURI` tells you where these nodes came from.
trans-unit.target: `BaseURI`告诉这些节点来自何处。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property varies depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值取决于节点类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, Document nodes return the location of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object.
trans-unit.target: 例如，文档节点返回的位置<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>对象。

trans-unit.source: Nodes which are child nodes of external EntityReference nodes return the location of the entity itself.
trans-unit.target: 外部 EntityReference 节点的子节点的节点返回的实体本身的位置。

trans-unit.source: For example, consider the following XML document:
trans-unit.target: 例如，考虑下面的 XML 文档：

trans-unit.source: where the external entity `a/b.xml` contains the XML text: `<test>123</test>`.
trans-unit.target: 其中的外部实体`a/b.xml`包含 XML 文本： `<test>123</test>`。

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 此属性是文档对象模型 (DOM) 的 Microsoft 扩展。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the child nodes of the node.
trans-unit.target: 获取节点的所有子节点。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains all the child nodes of the node.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含节点的所有子节点的对象。

trans-unit.source: If there are no child nodes, this property returns an empty <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有子节点，该属性返回空 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" />。

trans-unit.source: For information about child nodes, see the [W3C DOM (Core) Level 1 specification](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-DOM-Level-1/level-one-core.html)
trans-unit.target: 有关子节点的信息，请参阅[W3C DOM (Core) 级别 1 规范](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-DOM-Level-1/level-one-core.html)

trans-unit.source: Creates a duplicate of this node.
trans-unit.target: 创建此节点的副本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned node.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的节点。

trans-unit.source: Cloning an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> copies all attributes and their values, including those generated by the XML processor to represent defaulted attributes.
trans-unit.target: 克隆<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>复制所有特性和它们的值，包括那些由 XML 处理器就可以表示默认的属性。

trans-unit.source: This method recursively clones the node and the subtree underneath it.
trans-unit.target: 此方法以递归方式克隆节点和其下的子树。

trans-unit.source: `Clone` is equivalent to calling `CloneNode(true)`.
trans-unit.target: `Clone` 等效于调用`CloneNode(true)`。

trans-unit.source: The node being inserted.
trans-unit.target: 插入的节点。

trans-unit.source: If `refChild` is `null`, insert `newChild` at the beginning of the list of child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 如果`refChild`是`null`，插入`newChild`的子节点列表的开头。

trans-unit.source: All the contents of the `newChild` are inserted, in the same order, after `refChild`.
trans-unit.target: 所有内容`newChild`，相同顺序之后插入`refChild`。

trans-unit.source: If the `newChild` is already in the tree, it is removed from its original position and added to its target position.
trans-unit.target: 如果`newChild`是已在树中，它是从其原始位置移除并添加到其目标位置。

trans-unit.source: For more information about inserting nodes, see [Inserting Nodes into an XML Document](~/docs/standard/data/xml/inserting-nodes-into-an-xml-document.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关插入节点的详细信息，请参阅[将节点插入 XML 文档](~/docs/standard/data/xml/inserting-nodes-into-an-xml-document.md)。

trans-unit.source: If the node being inserted was created from another document, you can use <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.ImportNode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to import the node to the current document.
trans-unit.target: 如果插入的节点已创建从另一个文档，则可以使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.ImportNode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>将节点导入到当前文档。

trans-unit.source: The imported node can then be inserted into the current document.
trans-unit.target: 然后，导入的节点可以插入到当前文档中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the namespace URI of this node.
trans-unit.target: 获取该节点的命名空间 URI。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of this node.
trans-unit.target: 该节点的命名空间 URI。

trans-unit.source: If there is no namespace URI, this property returns String.Empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有命名空间 URI，则此属性返回 String.Empty。

trans-unit.source: This is the namespace URI specified at creation time.
trans-unit.target: 这是在创建时指定的 URI 的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: For example, `NamespaceURI` is urn:samples for the element \<bk:book xmlns:bk= "urn:samples">
trans-unit.target: 例如，`NamespaceURI`是 urn： 示例元素\<bk:book xmlns:bk ="urn： 示例">

trans-unit.source: An attribute does not inherit its namespace from the element it is attached to.
trans-unit.target: 从附加到的元素，属性不会继承其命名空间。

trans-unit.source: If an attribute is not explicitly given a namespace, it simply has no namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性不显式指定命名空间，它只需具有不在命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Gets the node immediately following this node.
trans-unit.target: 获取紧接在该节点之后的节点。

trans-unit.source: The next <see langword="XmlNode" />.
trans-unit.target: 下一个 <see langword="XmlNode" />。

trans-unit.source: If there is no next node, <see langword="null" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有下一个节点，则返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays all the books in the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例 XML 文档中显示所有书籍。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the current node, when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中被重写时，获取当前节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: This property never returns the `XmlNodeType` EndElement, EndEntity or None.
trans-unit.target: 此属性永远不会返回`XmlNodeType`EndElement，EndEntity 或 None。

trans-unit.source: Puts all XmlText nodes in the full depth of the sub-tree underneath this XmlNode into a "normal" form where only markup (that is, tags, comments, processing instructions, CDATA sections, and entity references) separates XmlText nodes, that is, there are no adjacent XmlText nodes.
trans-unit.target: 将此 XmlNode 下子树完全深度中的所有 XmlText 节点都转换成“正常”形式，在这种形式中只有标记（即标记、注释、处理指令、CDATA 节和实体引用）分隔 XmlText 节点，也就是说，没有相邻的 XmlText 节点。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to ensure that the DOM view of a document is the same as if it were saved and re-loaded, and is useful when operations (such as XPointer lookups) that depend on a particular document tree structure are to be used.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以用于确保 DOM 文档视图的相同，就已保存，重新加载，并使用依赖于特定文档树状结构的操作 （如 XPointer 查找） 时才有用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup containing this node and all its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含此节点及其所有子节点的标记。

trans-unit.source: The markup containing this node and all its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 包含此节点及其所有子节点的标记。

trans-unit.source: <block subset="none" type="note"><para><see langword="OuterXml" /> does not return default attributes.
trans-unit.target: <block subset="none" type="note"><para><see langword="OuterXml" /> 不返回默认属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 此属性是文档对象模型 (DOM) 的 Microsoft 扩展。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例比较输出<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.InnerXml%2A>和`OuterXml`属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> to which this node belongs.
trans-unit.target: 获取该节点所属的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> to which this node belongs.
trans-unit.target: 该节点所属的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: If the node is an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> (NodeType equals XmlNodeType.Document), this property returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该节点是一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />（NodeType 等于 XmlNodeType.Document），则此属性返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When adding nodes to the current node, use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> returned by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.OwnerDocument%2A> property to create the node.
trans-unit.target: 将节点添加到当前节点中，使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>返回<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.OwnerDocument%2A>属性创建的节点。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.OwnerDocument%2A> (in the XmlElement class) for an example using this property.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.OwnerDocument%2A>（在 XmlElement 类中） 使用此属性的示例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent of this node (for nodes that can have parents).
trans-unit.target: 获取该节点的父级（针对可以拥有父级的节点）。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlNode" /> that is the parent of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 为当前节点父级的 <see langword="XmlNode" />。

trans-unit.source: If a node has just been created and not yet added to the tree, or if it has been removed from the tree, the parent is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点刚刚创建还未添加到树中，或如果已从树中移除了节点，则父级为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For all other nodes, the value returned depends on the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType" /> of the node.
trans-unit.target: 对于所有其他节点，返回的值取决于节点的 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType" />。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the possible return values for the <see langword="ParentNode" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述 <see langword="ParentNode" /> 属性可能的返回值。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> NodeType
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> NodeType

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Return Value of ParentNode
trans-unit.target: </term><description> ParentNode 的返回值

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> Attribute, Document, DocumentFragment, Entity, Notation
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term> 属性中，文档、 DocumentFragment、 实体、 表示法

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Returns <see langword="null" />; these nodes do not have parents.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 返回<see langword="null" />; 这些节点没有父级。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> CDATA
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> CDATA

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Returns the element or entity reference containing the CDATA section.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 返回包含 CDATA 节的元素或实体引用。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> Comment
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 注释

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Returns the element, entity reference, document type, or document containing the comment.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 返回元素、 实体引用、 文档类型或包含注释的文档。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> DocumentType
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> DocumentType

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Returns the document node.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 返回文档节点。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> Element
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 元素

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Returns the parent node of the element.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 返回该元素的父节点。

trans-unit.source: If the element is the root node in the tree, the parent is the document node.
trans-unit.target: 如果该元素是树中的根节点，则父级是文档节点。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> EntityReference
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> EntityReference

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Returns the element, attribute, or entity reference containing the entity reference.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 返回包含该实体引用的元素、 特性或实体引用。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> ProcessingInstruction
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> ProcessingInstruction

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Returns the document, element, document type, or entity reference containing the processing instruction.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 返回文档、 元素、 文档类型或包含处理指令的实体引用。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> Text
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> Text

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Returns the parent element, attribute, or entity reference containing the text node.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 返回父元素、 特性或实体引用包含该文本节点。

trans-unit.source: For information about parent and child nodes, see the [W3C DOM (Core) Level 1 specification](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-DOM-Level-1/level-one-core.html)
trans-unit.target: 有关父和子节点的信息，请参阅[W3C DOM (Core) 级别 1 规范](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-DOM-Level-1/level-one-core.html)

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace prefix of this node.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置该节点的命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix of this node.
trans-unit.target: 该节点的命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: For example, <see langword="Prefix" /> is bk for the element <bk:book>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<see langword="Prefix" />元素是黑<bk:book>。

trans-unit.source: If there is no prefix, this property returns String.Empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有前缀，则该属性返回 String.Empty。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property, when permitted, changes the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Name%2A> property, which holds the qualified name, on Element and Attribute nodes.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许，请设置此属性，更改<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Name%2A>属性，用于持有元素和属性节点的限定的名称。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property on node types that cannot have a prefix (such as Text, Comment, EntityReference, CDATA, ProcessingInstruction, Document, and DocumentFragment) has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 在不能有一个前缀，（例如文本、 注释、 EntityReference、 CDATA、 ProcessingInstruction、 文档和 DocumentFragment） 的节点类型上设置此属性不起作用。

trans-unit.source: Changing the prefix of an attribute that is known to have a default value, does not make a new attribute with the default value and the original prefix appear, since the namespace URI and local name do not change.
trans-unit.target: 更改的属性具有默认值已知的前缀，未进行默认值的新属性，原始前缀出现，这是因为命名空间 URI 和本地名称都不会更改。

trans-unit.source: This node is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 该节点是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The specified prefix contains an invalid character.
trans-unit.target: 指定的前缀包含无效字符。

trans-unit.source: The specified prefix is malformed.
trans-unit.target: 指定的前缀格式不正确。

trans-unit.source: The specified prefix is "xml" and the namespaceURI of this node is different from "http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace".
trans-unit.target: 指定的前缀为“xml”，而该节点的 namespaceURI 与“http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace”不同。

trans-unit.source: This node is an attribute and the specified prefix is "xmlns" and the namespaceURI of this node is different from "http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/ ".
trans-unit.target: 该节点是一个属性，指定的前缀为“xmlns”，且该节点的 namespaceURI 与“http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/”不同。

trans-unit.source: This node is an attribute and the qualifiedName of this node is "xmlns".
trans-unit.target: 该节点是一个特性，而该节点的 qualifiedName 是“xmlns”。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Prefix" /> in a derived class, this property cannot be set.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see langword="Prefix" />在派生类中，不能设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: The node to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的节点。

trans-unit.source: All the contents of the node to be added are moved into the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的节点的全部内容会移动到指定位置。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for this node.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的节点添加到该节点的子节点列表的开头。

trans-unit.source: The node added.
trans-unit.target: 添加的节点。

trans-unit.source: If the `newChild` is already in the tree, it is removed from its original position and added to its target position.
trans-unit.target: 如果`newChild`是已在树中，它是从其原始位置移除并添加到其目标位置。

trans-unit.source: For more information about inserting nodes, see [Inserting Nodes into an XML Document](~/docs/standard/data/xml/inserting-nodes-into-an-xml-document.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关插入节点的详细信息，请参阅[将节点插入 XML 文档](~/docs/standard/data/xml/inserting-nodes-into-an-xml-document.md)。

trans-unit.source: If the node being inserted was created from another document, you can use <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.ImportNode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to import the node to the current document.
trans-unit.target: 如果插入的节点已创建从另一个文档，则可以使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.ImportNode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>将节点导入到当前文档。

trans-unit.source: The imported node can then be inserted into the current document.
trans-unit.target: 然后，导入的节点可以插入到当前文档中。

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 此方法是 Microsoft 扩展到文档对象模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: The following example adds a new node to the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将新节点添加到 XML 文档。

trans-unit.source: This node is of a type that does not allow child nodes of the type of the <paramref name="newChild" /> node.
trans-unit.target: 此节点的类型不允许 <paramref name="newChild" /> 节点类型的子节点。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="newChild" /> is an ancestor of this node.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newChild" /> 是此节点的上级节点。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="newChild" /> was created from a different document than the one that created this node.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newChild" /> 是从不同于创建此节点的文档创建的。

trans-unit.source: This node is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 该节点是只读的。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="PrependChild" /> in a derived class, in order for events to be raised correctly, you must call the <see langword="PrependChild" /> method of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see langword="PrependChild" />在派生类中，按正确，会引发事件的顺序必须调用<see langword="PrependChild" />基本类的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the node immediately preceding this node.
trans-unit.target: 获取紧接在该节点之前的节点。

trans-unit.source: The preceding <see langword="XmlNode" />.
trans-unit.target: 前一个 <see langword="XmlNode" />。

trans-unit.source: If there is no preceding node, <see langword="null" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果前面没有节点，则返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays all the books in the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例 XML 文档中显示所有书籍。

trans-unit.source: Gets the text node that immediately precedes this node.
trans-unit.target: 获取紧接在该节点之前的文本节点。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" />。

trans-unit.source: This property has faster performance than the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.PreviousSibling%2A> property but you can use it only to get a node of type <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType.Text>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性具有更快的性能比<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.PreviousSibling%2A>属性，但你可以使用它只用于获取类型的节点<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType.Text>。

trans-unit.source: To get any other type of node that that precedes this node, use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.PreviousSibling%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取任何其他类型的节点，在该节点之前，请使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.PreviousSibling%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Removes all the child nodes and/or attributes of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 移除当前节点的所有子节点和/或属性。

trans-unit.source: If a removed attribute is known to have a default value, an attribute immediately appears containing the default value and, if applicable, the corresponding namespace URI, local name, and prefix.
trans-unit.target: 如果已知已删除的特性具有默认值，则立即出现一个属性，它包含默认值并且，如果适用，对应的命名空间 URI、 本地名称和前缀。

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 此方法是 Microsoft 扩展到文档对象模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: The following example removes all child and attribute nodes from the root node.

trans-unit.source: Selects a list of nodes matching the XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: 选择匹配 XPath 表达式的节点列表。

trans-unit.source: XPath expressions can include namespaces.
trans-unit.target: XPath 表达式可以包含命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Namespace resolution is supported using the `XmlNamespaceManager`.
trans-unit.target: 使用 `XmlNamespaceManager` 支持命名空间解析。

trans-unit.source: If the XPath expression includes a prefix, the prefix and namespace URI pair must be added to the `XmlNamespaceManager`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XPath 表达式包含前缀，前缀和命名空间 URI 对必须添加到`XmlNamespaceManager`。

trans-unit.source: If the XPath expression does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace URI is the empty namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XPath 表达式不包含前缀，则假定命名空间 URI 是空的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still add a prefix and namespace URI to the `XmlNamespaceManager`; otherwise, you will not get any nodes selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML 包含默认命名空间，还必须添加前缀和命名空间 URI 到`XmlNamespaceManager`; 否则为将不会获取任何所选的节点。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Select Nodes Using XPath Navigation](~/docs/standard/data/xml/select-nodes-using-xpath-navigation.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XPath 导航选择节点](~/docs/standard/data/xml/select-nodes-using-xpath-navigation.md)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> containing a collection of nodes matching the XPath query.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" />，包含匹配 XPath 查询的节点集合。

trans-unit.source: If the XPath expression requires namespace resolution, you must use the `SelectNodes` overload which takes an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> as its argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XPath 表达式需要命名空间解析，则必须使用`SelectNodes`重载此方法采用<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>作为其自变量。

trans-unit.source: The `XmlNamespaceManager` is used to resolve namespaces.
trans-unit.target: `XmlNamespaceManager`用于解析命名空间。

trans-unit.source: If the XPath expression does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace URI is the empty namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XPath 表达式不包含前缀，则假定命名空间 URI 是空的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still use the `XmlNamespaceManager` and add a prefix and namespace URI to it; otherwise, you will not get any nodes selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML 包含默认命名空间，你仍必须使用`XmlNamespaceManager`并向其中添加前缀和命名空间 URI; 否则，将无法获取任何所选的节点。

trans-unit.target: 如果想要搜索包含双引号的值，必须将字符串括在单引号中。

trans-unit.source: If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still add a prefix and namespace URI to the `XmlNamespaceManager`; otherwise, you will not get a node selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML 包含默认命名空间，还必须添加前缀和命名空间 URI 到`XmlNamespaceManager`; 否则为将不会获取选定的节点。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Select Nodes Using XPath Navigation](~/docs/standard/data/xml/select-nodes-using-xpath-navigation.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XPath 导航选择节点](~/docs/standard/data/xml/select-nodes-using-xpath-navigation.md)。

trans-unit.source: A common issue when formulating XPath expressions is how to include a single quote (') or double quote (") in the expression.
trans-unit.target: 制定 XPath 表达式时的一个常见问题是如何在表达式中包含单引号 （'） 或双引号 （"）。

trans-unit.source: If you have to search for a value that includes a single quote, you must enclose the string in double quotes.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有要搜索包含单引号的值，必须将字符串括在双引号内。

trans-unit.source: If you need to search for a value that includes a double quote, you must enclose the string in single quotes.
trans-unit.target: 如果想要搜索包含双引号的值，必须将字符串括在单引号中。
